
```{r}
x <- read_xlsx("class_enrollment_summary_by_term_9.17.19.xlsx", skip = 3)

```

```{r}
x %>%
  arrange(desc(Total)) %>%
  filter(`Course Department` == "English") %>%
  select(`Course Title`, `Course Name`, Total)
```
